ygData.subject: Pixe Strike to be fixed?  Possible 49th song???
ygData.msgSnippet: Title says it all; here s Absor s post: We are looking into a few bardic changes. Nothing is set in stone yet on this, it still has to be reviewed, but I
ygData.messageBody:
Title says it all; here's Absor's post:


We are looking into a few bardic changes. Nothing is set in stone yet on
this, it still has to be reviewed, but I thought I´┐¢d let you know what we´┐¢re
thinking about. We are thinking about reducing secondary resists for
targeted mesmerize songs (with the possibility of a new song along these
lines). There are some other potential changes that we are considering, but
I´┐¢ll have to tell you about them after we have a chance to talk them over
further.

Alan
